description: Failed to parse string as number. Common when parsing user input or data from external sources.
commonCauses: Currency symbols or commas in input
Scientific notation not supported by parser
solutions: Use toIntOrNull() instead of toInt() in Kotlin
Use try-catch for parsing external data
Provide default values with Elvis operator
prevention: Use Kotlin's safe parsing: toIntOrNull(), toDoubleOrNull()
Validate user input with input filters
Use EditText inputType="number" for numeric fields
Test parsing with edge cases (empty, special chars)
Provide clear error messages for invalid input
Use data classes with validated constructors
